page.title: 10A Survey of Bradley. Part 1.
page.content: In our class we got into small groups and wrote questions which we wanted to ask people. We then got together to sort out any repetition. After we had finished our{questionaire}we went out in three groups to talk to people in squares{2406 and 2407.}We spoke to{61 people and this is what we found. Well over half the people had lived in their house less than{10 years.}Well over half had moved into the area but nearly all of those came from the local area, only 8 from outside the county. Nearly all expected to remain in the area after{retirement.}Opinion was fairly equally divided on the plans for{2000 houses}etc. in square {2506,}most of the opposition was due to fear of damage to{wildlife.}Nearly all wanted to see local woods and open areas remain as{recreational {resources.
